11 
12 /*
13  Sanity note: The ADC on the SkyCompass PCB is the ADS112C04 by Texas
14  Instruments. The library we're using is originally for the
15  ADS122C04. The library has been modified to account for the
16  difference where it matters (112 is 16-bit, 122 is 24) but still
17  refers to 122 as opposed to 112.
18 */
19 POL_OP::POL_OP(std::string i2c_bus,
20  uint8_t A2D1_addr,
21  uint8_t A2D2_addr,
22  bool debug,
23  uint8_t channel){
24  // std::vector<uint8_t> A2D_addrs;
25  // A2D_addrs.push_back(A2D1_addr);
26  // A2D_addrs.push_back(A2D2_addr);
27  uint8_t A2D_addrs[2] = {A2D1_addr, A2D2_addr};
28 
29  for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++){
30  // Debugging output disabled by default
31  if (debug)
32  A2Ds[i].enableDebugging();
33 
34  // Initialise the A2Ds
35  if(!(A2Ds[i].begin(A2D_addrs[i], i2c_bus))){
36  LOG("A2D" << i+1 << " initialisation error. Exiting.");
37  exit(1);
38  }
39 
40  uint8_t rate = 1; //Default 0; 3 bit code is used to select the datarate, see datasheet
41  if(!(A2Ds[i].configureADCmode(ADS122C04_POL_OP_MODE, rate))){
42  LOG("A2D" << i+1 << " mode configuration error. Exiting.");
43  exit(1);
44  }
45 
46  // Start the ADC. Needed for continuous mode, redundant for single-shot
47  A2Ds[i].start();
48  A2Ds[i].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0); //Initialise mux channel
49  }
50 
51  LOG("POL_OP: Init success");
52 
53  // Set mux channel
54  this->channel = channel;
55 }
56 
57 uint32_t POL_OP::read_raw_data(SFE_ADS122C04 A2D, uint8_t delay){
58  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(delay));
59  A2D.start(); // Start conversion
60 
61  // Record the start time so we can timeout
62  // _millis() provided by A2D header, should fix this (bb_util)
63  unsigned long start_time = _millis();
64  bool drdy = false;
65 
66  while ((drdy == false) &&
67  (_millis() < (start_time + ADS122C04_CONVERSION_TIMEOUT))
68  ){
69 
70  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(5));
71  drdy = A2D.checkDataReady();
72  }
73 
74  if (drdy == false) {
75  LOG("DRDY timed out.");
76  return 0; // Error codes?
77  }
78 
79  // Read raw data and covert to volts (method 1).
80  int32_t raw_ADC_data = A2D.readADC();
81  return raw_ADC_data;
82  // float volts_1 = ((float)raw_ADC_data) * 244.14e-9;
83 }
84 
85 uint32_t POL_OP::read_continuous(SFE_ADS122C04 A2D, uint8_t delay){
86  // Data counter isn't use, we just assume coversion will be new.
87  // There will probably need to be some delay to avoid wrecking the bus
88  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(delay));
89  int32_t raw_ADC_data = A2D.readADC();
90  return raw_ADC_data;
91 }

93 bool POL_OP::read_A2D(uint8_t idx, uint32_t* readings, uint8_t delay){
94  /*
95  Performs one complete read cycle of a specific A2D.
96  Results are stored in readings, which should be
97  declared by the caller.
98 
99  Output array should be large enough for both results.
100  */
101  if (idx > N_A2Ds - 1) {
102  LOG("A2D read err, A2D idx out of range.");
103  return false;
104  }
105 
106  // A2Ds[idx].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0);
107  // readings[0] = read_raw_data(A2Ds[idx]);
108  // A2Ds[idx].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN3_AIN2);
109  // readings[1] = read_raw_data(A2Ds[idx]);
110 
111  // if (A2Ds[idx].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN0_AIN1)){
112  // readings[0] = read_continuous(A2Ds[idx], delay);
113  // }
114 
115  // if(A2Ds[idx].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN2_AIN3)){
116  // readings[1] = read_continuous(A2Ds[idx], delay);
117  // }
118 
119  A2Ds[idx].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN0_AIN1);
120  readings[0] = read_continuous(A2Ds[idx], delay);
121  A2Ds[idx].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN2_AIN3);
122  readings[1] = read_continuous(A2Ds[idx], delay);
123 
124  return true;
125 }

127 bool POL_OP::read_sensor(int *readings, uint8_t delay){
128  uint32_t out_1[2];
129  uint32_t out_2[2];
130 
131  bool r1 = read_A2D(0,out_1,delay);
132  bool r2 = read_A2D(1,out_2,delay);
133  if (!(r1 && r2)){
134  LOG("Error reading from one or more A2Ds.");
135  return false;
136  }
137 
138  for (int i = 0; i < N_A2Ds; i++){
139  // Sign-extended readings
140  readings[i] = (((int) out_1[i]) << 16) >> 16;
141  readings[i+2] =(((int) out_2[i]) << 16) >> 16;
142  }
143  std::bitset<32> c_read = readings[0];
144  std::bitset<32> c_read_1 = readings[1];
145 
146  // LOG("Reading[0]: " << c_read);
147  // LOG("Reading[1]: " << c_read_1);
148 
149  // Read successful
150  return true;
151 }

153 bool POL_OP::read_sensor_interleaved(int *readings, uint8_t delay){
154  uint32_t out_1[2] = {0,0};
155  uint32_t out_2[2] = {0,0};
156 
157  int read_times[4] = {0,0,0,0};
158 
159  auto start = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
160  // Reads are interleaved to give the multiplexers a chance to change.
161  out_1[0] = read_continuous(A2Ds[0], delay);
162  auto time = std::chrono::system_clock::now() - start;
163  auto millis = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(time);
164  read_times[0] = (int) millis.count();
165 
166  A2Ds[0].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN2_AIN3);
167 
168  start = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
169  out_2[0] = read_continuous(A2Ds[1], delay);
170  time = std::chrono::system_clock::now() - start;
171  millis = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(time);
172  read_times[1] = (int) millis.count();
173 
174 
175  A2Ds[1].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN2_AIN3);
176  start = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
177  out_1[1] = read_continuous(A2Ds[0], delay);
178  time = std::chrono::system_clock::now() - start;
179  millis = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(time);
180  read_times[2] = (int) millis.count();
181 
182  start = std::chrono::system_clock::now();
183  out_2[1] = read_continuous(A2Ds[1], delay);
184  time = std::chrono::system_clock::now() - start;
185  millis = std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(time);
186  read_times[3] = (int) millis.count();
187 
188  // Reset multiplexers to starting position
189  A2Ds[0].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0);
190  A2Ds[1].setInputMultiplexer(ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0);
191 
192  std::stringstream ss;
193  ss << "PD read times: [ ";
194  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++){
195  if (i < 3)
196  ss << read_times[i] << "ms, ";
197  else
198  ss << read_times[i] << "ms ] " << std::endl;
199  }
200 
201  std::cout << ss.str();
202 
203  // DEBUG - Interleaved read fails for the last POL_OP. WHY?
204  // std::cout << "delay: " << (int) delay << std::endl;
205  // std::cout << "o1: [" << out_1[0] << ", " << out_1[1] << "]" << std::endl;
206  // std::cout << "o2: [" << out_2[0] << ", " << out_2[1] << "]" << std::endl;
207  // std::cout << "millis: " << millis.count() << std::endl;
208 
209 
210  for (int i = 0; i < N_A2Ds; i++){
211  // Sign-extended readings
212  readings[i] = (((int) out_1[i]) << 16) >> 16;
213  readings[i+2] =(((int) out_2[i]) << 16) >> 16;
214  }
215  std::bitset<32> c_read = readings[0];
216  std::bitset<32> c_read_1 = readings[1];
217 
218  return true;
219 }

221 uint8_t POL_OP::get_channel(){ return this->channel; }
222 
223 /*
224  Set the PGA gain for the sensor. Note the gain must be a valid 3-bit
225  gain setting for the ADS122C04. Use relevant definitions in
226  ADS122C04_ADC_PI.hpp (ADS122C04_GAIN_X) to ensure valid settings
227  are used. No error checking is included!
228  */
229 bool POL_OP::set_gain(uint8_t gain){
230  bool ret = true;
231  for (int i = 0; i < N_A2Ds; i++) {
232  // For each A2D get the most recent initParams, update the
233  // gain and then reinitialise the chip.
234  ADS122C04_initParam* initParams = A2Ds[i].getCurrentInitParams();
235  initParams->gainLevel = gain;
236  ret = ret && A2Ds[i].reinitialise();
237  if (!ret) LOG("Reinitialisation error with ADC " << i+1);
238  }
239 
240  if (ret) LOG("POL_OP: Gain set to " << (int) gain << ".");
241  return ret;
242 }
243 
244 
245 /*
246 Set data rate using presets defined in ADS122_ADC_PI.hpp;
247 included below for convenience.
248 
249 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_20SPS 0x0
250 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_45SPS 0x1
251 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_90SPS 0x2
252 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_175SPS 0x3
253 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_330SPS 0x4
254 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_600SPS 0x5
255 #define ADS122C04_DATA_RATE_1000SPS 0x6
256 */
257 bool POL_OP::set_data_rate(uint8_t rate){
258  bool ret = true;
259  for (int i = 0; i < N_A2Ds; i++) {
260  // For each A2D get the most recent initParams, update the
261  // gain and then reinitialise the chip.
262  ADS122C04_initParam* initParams = A2Ds[i].getCurrentInitParams();
263  initParams->dataRate = rate;
264  ret = ret && A2Ds[i].reinitialise();
265  if (!ret) LOG("Reinitialisation error with ADC " << i+1);
266  }
267 
268  if (ret) LOG("POL_OP: Data rate set to " << (int) rate << ".");
269  return ret;
270 }
